work_experience.title: Data Engineer/Consultant
achievements: Designed and implemented data architectures resulting in a 30% reduction in data processing time for clients.
Collaborated with multiple clients to understand their data requirements, delivering customized solutions tailored to their objectives.
Led the development of a comprehensive application that reduced response time to office actions in trademark law by 50%.
Utilized advanced AI algorithms, including RAG (Retrieval-Augmented Generation), to achieve an accuracy rate of 95% in response generation.
Conducted 1000+ hours of rigorous testing and fine-tuning processes to minimize errors and ensure compliance with legal standards.
Provided ongoing support and maintenance to deployed solutions, ensuring 99.9% uptime and reliability in dynamic environments.

work_experience.title: Data Engineer Intern
achievements: Developed and maintained ETL pipelines using Python and SQL to process marketing data from various sources, including Meta, Google, and Act-On, resulting in a 50% reduction in data processing time and improved data accuracy by 20%.
Built APIs using Python to retrieve data from external sources, resulting in a 30% increase in data acquisition speed and 25% reduction in error rates.
Utilized Jenkins to schedule and automate ETL processes, improving efficiency and reducing manual errors.
Optimized database performance by conducting database tuning and index optimization, resulting in a 40% decrease in query execution time and improved system scalability.
Implemented data validation checks and data quality control measures, resulting in a 15% reduction in data inconsistency and improved data reliability.

work_experience.title: Managing Member (Data Engineer)
achievements: Founded and managed a successful barber business, achieving 100% growth in customer base and profit within the first 2 years.
Implemented data-driven strategies, including ETL pipelines using Python and SQL, reducing data processing time by 30%.
Designed and deployed a data warehouse solution for business analytics, increasing reporting speed by 50%.
Led the transition to a paperless practice, implementing an electronic booking system and optimizing business systems, reducing labor costs by 30% and overhead by 10%.
Implemented targeted marketing campaigns based on data analysis, resulting in a 75% increase in website interaction and a 40% increase in in-store sales compared to previous months.

projects.name: Action Responder
projects.technologies: Python, Flask, OpenAI, NLTK, Pandas, NumPy, Scikit-learn, Google Cloud Platform (GCP), Google Cloud BigQuery, Google Cloud Vision API, WandB
projects.description: Led the development of an AI-driven Flask application, slashing trademark response drafting time by 50% for 200+ legal professionals. Engineered seamless integration with USPTO APIs, processing over 10,000 legal documents with 95%+ accuracy using OpenAI API. Orchestrated dynamic prompt management for GPT, enabling contextually relevant response generation for 5,000+ unique office actions.

projects.name: Musical Journeys
projects.technologies: Python, Pandas, Spotipy, Scikit-learn, Librosa, Matplotlib, Jupyter Notebooks, Looker, GCP
projects.description: Developed music genre classifier achieving a .52 accuracy score. Processed over 10,000 unique songs for genre classification and recommendations. Implemented location-based suggestions for enhanced user experience.

projects.name: Weather Database
projects.technologies: Apache Airflow, Python, Pandas, SQL, BeautifulSoup, Jupyter Notebooks, Looker, GCP
projects.description: Reduced data processing time by 40%, processing 50,000+ daily weather data points. Demonstrated potential with hourly and daily Airflow DAG triggers, collecting 500+ data points per day.

projects.name: US Crime Analysis
projects.technologies: Python, Pandas, SQL, dbt, Jupyter Notebooks, Looker, GCP
projects.description: Transformed 3,000,000+ rows with ELT Pipeline. Visualized 5 analysis findings with Looker Studio.
